opponent.label: Jill
opponent.description: Jill Valentine is a member of STARS. An elite unit of the Raccon Police Deparment that relied on military veterans and weapons-trained scientists to solve serious crimes in Raccoon City. She joined the unit due to their strong commitment to justice and desire to "experience the true feeling of life". She is an expert on bomb disposal and lockpicking, due to this she is also known as the "Master of Unlocking".
